name: json-diff
description: Compare two JSON objects and show what changed - additions, deletions, and modifications with paths
author: echo

parameters.before: object|string - The original JSON (object or JSON string)
parameters.after: object|string - The modified JSON (object or JSON string)

options.ignoreOrder: boolean - Ignore array order differences (default: false)

returns.summary: object - Count of added, removed, modified items
returns.differences: array - List of all differences with paths and values
